question:

On the following grid, sketch the graph of \(f\).

[3]
a.

The graph of \(f\) is translated by the vector \(\left( {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}} 3 \\ { - 1} \end{array}} \right)\) to obtain the graph of a function \(g\).

Find an expression for \(g(x)\).
